snippet: The 2012 edition of the Cannes Film Festival will kick off with Wes Anderson's new film, "Moonrise Kingdom."
abstract: The 2012 edition of the Cannes Film Festival will kick off with Wes Anderson's new film, "Moonrise Kingdom."

headline.main: Wes Anderson Film to Open Cannes Festival
headline.print_headline: Wes Anderson Film To Open Cannes
